products.name: Guanbana Canvas Bag in Lagoon Blue
products.brandedName: Guanbana Canvas Bag in Lagoon Blue
products.unbrandedName: Guanbana Canvas Bag in Lagoon Blue
products.description: td {border: 1px solid #cccccc;}br {mso-data-placement:same-cell;}Ideal for a weekend away, this oversized canvas bag is simple, chic and practical. The canvas body is lined with durable acrylic and features a wide, sturdy base and single interior pocket. At the top, Guanabana's signature handwoven designs grace the patterned straps, just long enough to sling over your shoulders. Guanabana's boho-chic designs are the realization of founder Almudena Espinosa's dream to make a lasting positive impact on artisan communities. Founded in 2005 and based in Madrid, the brand's entirely handmade styles showcase both her Spanish heritage and the techniques of Latin America. Fun fact: the name is an ode to Almudena's favorite fruit, also known as soursop. Shop the entire Guanabana collection for matching hats, espadrilles, belts and more. Exclusive to Todd Snyder ; Canvas Body ; Acrylic Lining ; Handwoven 32 Acrylic Strap ; Interior Pocket ; Double-Lined Base ; Handmade in Colombia;

products.name: Saint Laurent Top Marcel Cravate in Brown
products.brandedName: Saint Laurent Top Marcel Cravate in Brown
products.description: Saint Laurent Top Marcel Cravate in Brown 100% silk. Made in Italy. Dry clean only. Hidden side zipper closure. Chiffon fabric. SLAU-MS181. 776303 Y2B11. About the designer: SAINT LAURENT has been influencing and revolutionizing the fashion industry since the debut of its iconic ‘Rive Gauche’ collection in 1966 - the couture house was the first to create a ready-to-wear capsule. The sleek, precisely tailored staples, like the signature biker jackets, transcend seasons and trends. Creative Director Anthony Vaccarello continues to honor the label’s illustrious reputation by reintroducing cult styles, including the ‘Lou’ handbag and ‘Tribute’ sandals.
